TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EditingContext extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Contains contextual state information for a designer, such as the . This includes permanent state information, such as the list of services running in the designer. It also includes transient state consisting of context items including the set of currently selected objects as well as the editing tool being used to manipulate objects on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext> represents the communication boundary that is shared between the hosting application and the [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/includes/wfd1-md.md)]. The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext> was implemented as a concrete class for ease of use. Override <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateServiceManager%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.CreateContextItemManager%2A> to use customized managers derived from <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager> and <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager CreateContextItemManager() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the context item manager that is returned by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default implementation creates a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ContextItemManager> that supports delayed activation of design editor managers through the declaration of a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback> attribute on the design editor manager.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager CreateServiceManager() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the service manager to be returned from the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default implementation creates a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ServiceManager> that supports delayed activation of design editor managers through the declaration of a <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.SubscribeContextCallback> attribute on the design editor manager.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Immediately releases any unmanaged resources used by the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: if this object is being disposed of; if the object is finalizing.
Docs.summary: Immediately releases the unmanaged resources used by the current object.
Occurs when the method is called or when the object is finalized and collected by the garbage collector of the Microsoft .NET common language runtime.
Returns the local collection of context items stored by the current editing context.
Docs.value: The collection of objects used in this editing context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Items%2A> collection is for data that is shared between a host and the designer. This data provides the mechanism needed to hook into subscription and change notification.

Docs.summary: Returns the service manager used in the current editing context.
Docs.value: The used in this editing context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext.Services%2A> represent functionality that is either provided by the host for the designer to use or that is used by the designer to make functionality available to all designers within the editor.
